reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Namibia Chamber of Commerce and Industry was granted a total funding of approx. 80 000 euros for a one and a half-year project that strengthens the capacity of the Namibian private sector to actively engage and utilize opportunities in international and na tional markets. The project has two components of which the first one is to build the internationalization capacity of the Namibian private sector and secondly to increase the capacity of Namibian private sector players to respond to the development challe nges in Namibia.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

location.ref: Khomas region, SMEs throughout the country.
